name: North Modding Company: Bergsbruk
description:
Bergsbruk is taking open world simulation to new heights with a world 26x bigger than earth with exavators, wheelloaders, graders, crushers, trucks and much more that lets you mine gold, crush gravel, build roads, tunnels or just play around with heavy equipment but they will breakdown and need repairs.

All Vehicles behave diffrently with diffrent engines and depending on the condition of the machine.

The entire world is diggable and destructive, so everything you can see you can dig.

Buy new equipment from selling gold, gravel and send invoices for work you done to build your fleet of machines

Tune and repaint machines to make them personal and fancy.

And you are free to roam around the world and just have fun!
